channel.title: Mining Problem :(
channel.description: I have added rocks to a certain area (skilling area) and when i mine them, it does it without pickaxe(you dont need pickaxe to mine, it will mine with anything wielded :( ). How can i make it so that you need a pickaxe to mine the rocks?

item.title: Mining Problem :(
item.dc:creator: @Thetwistedsnake Thetwistedsnake
item.description:
@Thetwistedsnake wrote:

[quote=".., post:8, topic:361926"]Done, but it didn’t do anything

It does the mining animation when i don’t have a pickaxe wielded. And in the chatbox it says

"You need a pickaxe to mine ores."

Do you get ores without the pickaxe?
Or no?

Read full topic

It does the mining animation when i don’t have a pickaxe wielded. And in the chatbox it says

item.title: Mining Problem :(
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

Ok, i already have

resetMI();

under “you need a pickaxe to mine ore”

But where do i add the

setAnimation(-1);? :o

Sorry! Btw thank you for helping me on this!

Read full topic

item.title: Mining Problem :(
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

look for the message
“you need a pickaxe to mine ore”
and just do

resetMI();

right under that.
and you might want to add this

setAnimation(-1);

Read full topic

item.title: Mining Problem :(
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

Ok, i edited the code and now when i haven’t got a pickaxe equipped it does say “you need a pickaxe to mine ore”(which is ok;) but it mines with whatever is wielded. :o

Read full topic

item.title: Mining Problem :(
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

make a simple if statement req. a pick. also alot of servers just show the anim when u clik it without allowing u to actually mine the rocks if u dont have a pick. just set the anim to “-1” if the pickaxe req. is false.

Read full topic

item.title: Mining Problem :(
item.dc:creator: @Thetwistedsnake Thetwistedsnake
item.description:
@Thetwistedsnake wrote:

.:BOOM:.:

I have added rocks to a certain area (skilling area) and when i mine them, it does it without pickaxe(you dont need pickaxe to mine, it will mine with anything wielded ). How can i make it so that you need a pickaxe to mine the rocks?

ok
search for “addSkillXP(mining[2],”
under it youll find something like below

} else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); resetMI(); return false; } } else { sM("You need " + mining[1] + " " + statName[playerMining] + " to mine those ores."); resetMI(); return false; } return true;
Replace it with this

} else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); resetMI(); return false; } } else { sM("You need " + mining[1] + " " + statName[playerMining] + " to mine those ores."); resetMI(); return false; } } else { sM("You need a pick axe to mine ores."); resetMI(); return false; } return true; }
delta only that code above is delta btw
I dont think this would work You have to replace more than this i suppose

Read full topic
